Andrea Baker

UX Specialist & Web Designer

My name is Andrea. I love the creative process; I believe in efficient design. My favorite projects are those that involve starting from wire frames and working with a client all the way to a fully functioning site.

My experience includes web design, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, wire framing, user testing, prototyping, Github, and design implementation.

If I'm not working you can most likely find me at a Cincinnati tech meet up. Or perhaps: getting on a plane to explore new places.
